name: deimosrising
text: Ultra Peanut does not fuck around

name: wolfslice
text: "Frower" gave me a solid laugh just now

text: FRASH PRUGIN

name: greymantledwolf
text:
[belly laugh]
chubby for ya

name: greymantledwolf
text:
wait, that sounded wrong.

name: hipjiverobot
text: I don't know why this is so funny. It's ridiculous.

name: william
text: Why is 'Home' capitalized in the fifth panel?

name: mira
text: Probably to insinuate her accented English.

name: gtc
text:
Maybe it is to emphasise that she is calling out to him? Like this:

lower case is talking softly...
Sentence capitalisation is talking normally.
This is Calling Out!
NOW I AM YELLING!

name: william
text: A comment left by william was marked as spam and excluded. william: What a douche. (reported by jstegall, SSDDR, Saint)

name: centipede_damascus
text: Ultra Peanut destroys the competition.

name: saint
text: A comment left by saint was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, mortshire, farqussus, alejandroadam, usversusthem)

name: tombsgrave
text: MATRICIDE

name: heccibiggs
text: No, that's killing your own mother, not just anybody's mother.

name: deusoma
text: Yeah, I think this is just plain old homicide.

name: charchar
text:
floricide/ herbicide

Maybe maesiocide (the killing of a pregnant woman)? I don't know, that's a neologism on my part.

name: baryonyx
text: Floramaesiocide, of course.

name: overmedicated
text: Dum Dum DUM.

name: nathanielperson
text: I think this was a Nick Cave song.

name: ttagxamm
text: "Where The Wild Roses Grow," maybe?

name: closefriend
text: I think this is the one instance in the history of Achewood in which Ultra Peanut is nice to Philippe.

name: zefiel
text: And in the process, messes terrible with his mind. She's always a step ahead, dude.

name: trollcollins
text: Sometimes I think Ultra Peanut is my favourite minor character.

name: greymantledwolf
text: agreed.

name: greymantledwolf
text: i think i'd give just about anything to hear her voice, and yet in hearing it, i would forever lose my imagination of it all watterson like.

name: drycup
text: This was one of the first strips that I gasped at.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: same here. yowzers.

name: charchar
text: I missed Halloween once... I can't imagine how awful that knowledge would be coupled with widowhood.

name: unsentletter
text: You kill me, Onstad.

name: tttt2
text: a five year old was so worried that he forgot about Halloween

name: pzukowski
text: Ha! Here's your dead flower wife, dude!

name: tekende
text: Actually, Philippe, one can argue with that. This is where infidelity and many divorces come from.

name: noah_j
text: i think we can all agree that, for philippe, this is the saddest thing

name: stereo
text: Kiss the flower! Kiss the flower!

name: troy_convers
text: Getting rid of the competition...

name: mikeronomicon
text: I love Ultra Peanut. I think she is my favorite.

name: echasketch
text: Homewrecker.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i wonder why philippe thinks ultra peanut is worth all the agony.... its not like he hears from her, except when she was going to show up.  that flower was more of a rad chick to him that that she-bitch ever was.
